citations.narrative:
At time of inspection of the Pacific Animal Productions live animal exhibit at Pima County Fair in Tucson, Arizona, the
above-named individual did not possess a valid USDA license to exhibit animals or operate as a dealer. Conducting
unlicensed activity of regulated animals does not allow for appropriate oversight and enforcement of the Animal Welfare
Act. No person shall operate as a dealer or exhibitor without a valid license.
Correct by: 6 May 2023.

Records of animals on hand, of acquisition and disposition were not available at time of inspection. Not having such
records impedes inspection process to determine all animals present under care of the licensee or registrant and origin of
acquired animals. Every dealer shall make, keep and maintain records which fully and correctly disclose information on
animals in their possession or under their control, including for temporary events such as exhibition.
Correct by: 6 May 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with representative.
